comments.body:
Hi [~koki_shigeyama],
Can you please share tiapp.xml file here? As I noticed there have several 3rd party iOS module which may not have support for 64-bit iOS architecture, that's why you are getting this error normal x86_64. Follow this below documentation: 
1. http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest//#!/guide/iOS_Module_64-bit_Support
Then delete project build folder and again build it. 

Thanks.

[^tiapp.xml] 
Hi  Riduanul Islam,

OK, I will share the tiapp.xml file.
Please check the attached file.

Hi Riduanul Islam,

I found the solution.
I solved it by using this module.
ã€€https://github.com/appcelerator-modules/ti.compression/releases/tag/ios-2.0.0

Please close the ticket.
Thanks.
